009
010package imagingbook.common.filter.nonlinear;
011
012import java.util.Arrays;
013
014import imagingbook.common.filter.generic.GenericFilter;
015import imagingbook.common.filter.generic.GenericFilterScalar;
016import imagingbook.common.filter.mask.CircularMask;
017import imagingbook.common.image.PixelPack.PixelSlice;
018
019/**
020 * Ordinary (scalar) median filter for color images implemented
021 * by extending the {@link GenericFilter} class.
022 * Color images are filtered individually in all channels.
023 * 
024 * @author W. Burger
025 * @version 2020/12/31
026 */
027public class ScalarMedianFilter extends GenericFilterScalar {
028        
029        public static class Parameters {
030                /** Filter radius */
031                public double radius = 3.0;
032        }
033        
034        private final CircularMask mask;
035        private final int maskCount;
036        private final int xc, yc;
037        private final byte[][] maskArray;
038        private final float[] supportRegion;
039        private final int medianIndex;
040        
041        public ScalarMedianFilter() {
042                this(new Parameters());
043        }
044        
045        public ScalarMedianFilter(Parameters params) {
046                this.mask = new CircularMask(params.radius);
047                this.maskCount = mask.getElementCount();
048                this.xc = mask.getCenterX();
049                this.yc = mask.getCenterY();
050                this.maskArray = mask.getByteArray();
051                this.supportRegion = new float[maskCount];
052                this.medianIndex = maskCount/2;
053        }
054
055        //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
056        
057        @Override
058        protected float doPixel(PixelSlice plane, int u, int v) {
059                int k = 0;
060                for (int i = 0; i < maskArray.length; i++) {
061                        int ui = u + i - xc;
062                        for (int j = 0; j < maskArray[0].length; j++) {
063                                if (maskArray[i][j] != 0) {
064                                        int vj = v + j - yc;
065                                        supportRegion[k] = plane.getVal(ui, vj);
066                                        k = k + 1;
067                                }
068                        }
069                }
070                Arrays.sort(supportRegion);
071                return supportRegion[medianIndex];
072        }
073}
